mapper.sql: CTGId, Year, Place, ClCode, ClName, CTGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_classtravelgdp where year=#{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_classtravelgdp
CTGId,
Year,
Place,
ClCode,
ClName,
CTGdp,
#{ctgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ctgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_classtravelgdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTGdp = #{ctgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where CTGId = #{ctgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_classtravelgdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClCode = #{clcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ClName = #{clname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTGdp = #{ctgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where CTGId = #{ctgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
